dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning new things?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thoroughly examine and analyze information to understand complex concepts.
Your FarTwin will focus on hands-on experience and applying knowledge in real-world situations.

dimensions.label: Work Environment
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to work?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thrive in collaborative environments, valuing teamwork and camaraderie.
Your FarTwin prefers to work independently, focusing on individual projects and goals.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin remains hopeful and positive when dealing with global challenges, seeking solutions that benefit all.
Your FarTwin approaches global issues with a measured approach, prioritizing caution and careful consideration.

dimensions.label: Technological Adoption
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin adopt new technologies?

options.description: Your FarTwin is eager to explore and experiment with new technologies, often taking the lead in adoption.
Your FarTwin approaches technological advancements with caution, preferring to evaluate their benefits before embracing change.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin addresses conflicts head-on, using assertive communication to find solutions.
Your FarTwin seeks a mutually beneficial resolution, prioritizing harmony and cooperation over confrontation.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin engages in immersive creative activities, such as role-playing or art, to fully express themselves.
Your FarTwin approaches creativity through analytical thinking, examining patterns and structures to generate new ideas.

dimensions.label: Ambition Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin pursue their goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin sets ambitious targets, pushing themselves and others to achieve outstanding results.
Your FarTwin takes a thoughtful approach, carefully planning and executing steps towards achieving long-term goals.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle emotional situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly attuned to the emotions of others, providing support and validation when needed.
Your FarTwin prioritizes practical solutions over emotional concerns, focusing on finding effective outcomes.
